jabber.client.Roster

type
class
available in
neko, js, flash, php, node
Client roster (serverside saved contact list)

Static Variables

defaultSubscriptionMode : RosterSubscriptionMode

Constructor

new(stream : Stream, ?subscriptionMode : RosterSubscriptionMode)

Instance Variables

available(default,null) : Bool

groups(getGroups,null) : Array<String>

items(default,null) : Array<xmpp.roster.Item>

stream(default,null) : Stream

subscriptionMode : RosterSubscriptionMode

Instance Methods

addItem(jid : String, ?groups : Iterable<String>) : Bool

Add entry to your roster

cancelSubscription(jid : String) : Bool

Cancel the subscription from entity. You will no longer recieve presence updates.

confirmSubscription(jid : String, ?allow : Bool, ?subscribe : Bool) : Void

Allow the requesting entity to recieve presence updates from you.

dispose() : Void

getItem(jid : String) : xmpp.roster.Item

hasItem(jid : String) : Bool

load() : Void

dynamic onAdd(i : xmpp.roster.Item) : Void

Item got added to the roster

dynamic onAsk(i : xmpp.roster.Item) : Void

Incoming presence subscription request

dynamic onError(e : jabber.XMPPError) : Void

A roster manipulation error occured

dynamic onLoad() : Void

Roster got loaded

dynamic onRemove(i : xmpp.roster.Item) : Void

Item got removed from your roster

dynamic onSubscribed(i : xmpp.roster.Item) : Void

Subscribed to the presence of the contact

dynamic onSubscription(jid : String) : Void

Contact subscribed to your presence

dynamic onUnsubscribed(i : xmpp.roster.Item) : Void

Unsubscribed presence of the contact

dynamic onUnsubscription(i : xmpp.roster.Item) : Void

Contact unsubscribed from your presence

dynamic onUpdate(i : xmpp.roster.Item) : Void

Item got updated

removeItem(jid : String) : Bool

Remove entry from your roster

subscribe(jid : String) : Bool

Subscribe to the presence of the entity. You will get presence updates from this entity (if confirmed).

unsubscribe(jid : String, ?cancelSubscription : Bool) : Bool

Unsubscribe from entities presence. The entity will no longer recieve presence updates.
